_header: Ye christian people baptised in the faith
Note: Cf. 573 for text with introductory prologue.
_description: On the Order of Priesthood and the Virtues of the Mass — twenty 8-line stanzas (17 in English), with Latin prose interspersed

CULHh313.First Lines:
Ye cristen peple baptised in the faithe Preesthode to honoure
                    ensample take ye…
CULHh313.Last Lines:
…Wherfor to him be glory and preisyng ffor oure weele that so
                    ordeyned has
